actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Maritime Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Maritime Security

official_title: Recognizing the service and sacrifices of the Transportation Security Administration's employees and officers on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the establishment of TSA and the role TSA's employees and officers play in keeping our Nation secure.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: This resolution recognizes the service and sacrifices of the Transportation Security Administration's (TSA's) employees and officers on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the TSA and the role its employees and officers play in keeping our nation secure.

titles.title: Recognizing the service and sacrifices of the Transportation Security Administration's employees and officers on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the establishment of TSA and the role TSA's employees and officers play in keeping our Nation secure.
